speaker: Archmage
lines: The Archmage looks at you with a knowing smile.
He says you have chosen the path of knowledge. You will be taught the ways of the mage, and the ways of the world.
You walk with the archmage into a large room of labrenthd shelves, filled with books and scrolls.
He turns to you, the smile he had before fading away, replaced by a look of concern.
'Knowlege comes with a price. The price is your soul.'
'Those who seek knowledge must be willing to pay the price.'
'Are you willing to pay that price?'

choices.text: I am willing to pay the price.
I am not willing to pay the price.
